title: Apple AirPods - Does It Suck?
description: Apple AirPods... Are they any good or DO THEY SUCK?  Don't lose your Apple AirPods -   The Apple AirPods are a fully wireless set of earbuds designed for the iPhone 7 and others but they will work as a standard set of wireless bluetooth headphones on Android devices and more.  Some of the music I listened to -   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
